name: RECRUITER
description:
Recruit civilians to your army and fight the enemy!

RECRUITER is a top down shooter, where you recruit dumb civilians to your army before the enemy does the same. Your ultimate goal is to kill every enemy on the map with the help of your AI soldiers.

Features:

  • Large, open levels
  • Excessive amount of detail
  • Beefy sound design
  • Six levels and a cutscene
  • Interactable environment
  • Action packed action
